With a user-friendly interface and specialized tools, practitioners are able to create diagrams and organizational charts in minutes, rather than hours. An intuitive editor allows you to: select conventional shapes from a drop-down menu; automate labels, actions, and relationships; select a variety of line types; and build multi-step transactions by duplicating diagrams. 50+ Quick Start templates .nclude org charts involving corporations and partnerships, reorganizations, liquidations, and mergers and acquisitions - all providing a substantial head start on the diagramming process. Diagram review and revisions are also faster than ever with built-in collaboration. Teams can work together in real-time on building, reviewing, revising, and finalizing diagrams together in real-time - in a single platform. Don’t get lost in email threads or lose track of the most current version of a diagram ever again.

12.ABOUT: SurveyJS is a modern, feature-rich and high-performance solution that allows to create online forms, surveys, or questionnaires using an easy-to-use, no-code, drag & drop free form builder tool. The majority of cloud services in the market only provide infrastructure and storage facilities for your surveys. SurveyJS went beyond the market offer. It comprises an open-source MIT licensed JavaScript SurveyJS survey library / runner to generate a JSON definition of your survey that c pasted in your application code or be retrieved from the database to create a dynamic form; a SurveyJS survey creator / form builder is an embeddable GUI-based form/survey builder that allows to create a self-hosted infrastructure for generating literally any type of multi-language surveys/forms one can imagine; a SurveyJS Analytics Pack that visualizes survey results as charts/tables in a dashboard; and a SurveyJS Export to PDF, a service exports survey responses as PDF files. SurveyJS integrates with many popular frameworks, including React, Angular, and Vue – while still remaining fully jQuery compatible. It’s server- and database-agnostic. SurveyJS offers a choice of more than 35 question types, including text, drop-down, radio buttons, rating start etc. while also allowing to tailor the existing question types to your needs or add new ones if they are not on the menu, for example, by integrating a popular JavaScript widgets. Finally, with SurveyJS you can customize your survey/form design to your brand requirements easily adding any colors, logo, and fonts.

17.ABOUT: A NoSQL (often interpreted as “Not only SQL”) database is an unconventional database system which relies on data structure different from those used in the relational databases. NoSQL databases are increasingly used in big data and real time web applications. Advantco NoSQL adapter for SAP NetWeaver PI/PO enables you to read and write data from the un-conventional database with information in the SAP System. The NoSQL Adapter is based on the Adapter Framework and is executed by the pter Engine.

For design and verification engineers who are working with Verilog, SystemVerilog, Verilog AMS, VHDL, UPF, CPF, e Language, PSS, SLN, or SDL, the Design and Verification Tools (DVT) Eclipse IDE is an integrated development environment (IDE) that significantly improves productivity. Unlike plain text editors providing regular expression based capabilities, the DVT Eclipse IDE compiles the code and signals errors as you type, speeds-up code writing using auto-complete and quick fix proposals, an. allows you to find anything you are looking for instantly.

What the DVT Eclipse IDE can give you in seconds would likely have taken you several minutes or hours to find and do by hand.

It is similar to well-known programming tools like Visual Studio®, NetBeans®, and IntelliJ® that are commonly used in the software world.

2.ABOUT:
CodeMR is an architectural software quality and static code analysis tool that supports multiple languages (Java, Scala, Kotlin, C++) and has integrations for multiple IDEs (Eclipse and IntelliJ). CodeMR visualizes code metrics and high level quality attributes (Coupling, Complexity, Size) for C++, Java and Kotlin and Scala projects in different views, such as Package Structure, TreeMap, Sunburst, Dependency and Graph Views. The graph visualization technique applied in CodeMR is simple yet.intuitive. CodeMR has different filtering options and supports custom queries. It visualizes high-level Object Oriented quality attributes and low level metrics. Quality attributes are derived from the combinations of several metrics. You can also create different HTML reports for the project.

With Community Edition you can extract up to 50 source files and 60 classes.

6.ABOUT:
Medcases is a unique e-learning platform for medical students and doctors, which, by means of artificial intelligence algorithms, allows them to develop the skills of correct diagnosis and treatment of virtual patients. What problem does it solve? 1. Lack of access to patients 2. Practical knowledge is only available in the hospital or clinic 3. Practical skills cannot be acquired without independent decision making 4. Fear of making decisions among junior doctors due to concerns ab health related consequences for the patient
5. Knowledge contained in textbooks quickly becomes outdated

How does it solve these problems?
1. Practical knowledge available on the phone: taking patient history, physical exam, ordering lab and imaging tests, treatment
2. The ability to make independent decisions without fear of making mistakes
3. Knowing the consequences of your decisions without negatively impacting a real patient in the form of an accessible summary.
4. Possibility of discussion in the form of sharing comments under each medical case and test,
5. With Medcases is a mobile app, as well as web application, so you can learn anytime 24/7
6. Medical knowledge contained in our clinical cases is constantly updated according to the latest guidelines of Polish and World Scientific Societies.
